name: NEMESISTERS
description:
Enormous Ricky, the all-father, had many daughters. Uncountable, they could be found in every dimension where Largest Ricky held sway.

They could not be counted, but they could be sorted, and the thing they loved most of all was to demand that their father sort them, and choose who among them were his best...

Nemesisters is an interactive fiction game about finding your place in your big, weird family.
